name: Pauldrons of the Abyss
description: Dark shoulder armor that emanates an aura of foreboding.

name: Spaulders of the Crusade
description: Shoulder armor worn by champions who seek justice.

name: Mantle of the Wind
description: Flowing shoulder armor that grants incredible mobility.

name: Shoulders of Eternal Frost
description: Frosty shoulder armor that chills enemies with each strike.

name: Epaulets of the Arcane
description: Arcane-infused epaulets that enhance magical abilities.
